title: The Intercepted Message
description: Fix the corrupted spy message before transmission.
objective: Correct all typos in the message, then save and exit.
quote:
Every character matters.
A single misplaced letter
could compromise the entire operation.

Fix the message. Lives depend on it.
victory_quote:
Message corrected and transmitted.
The operation proceeds as planned.

You're learning the art of precision.
lore:
We've intercepted an urgent message from one of our
field agents. The transmission was corruptedâ€”
some letters are missing, others are wrong.

Your task: fix the message before it's too late.
Use 'i' to insert missing letters,
'x' to delete incorrect ones.

When the message is correct, save with :wq
